author: Nick Russo
title: Nation & World
text: {p}{strong}From A.J. Mastrangelo, Storm Team 10 Meteorologist:{/strong}{/p}{p}Chilly morning out there this morning with temperatures in the 30s/upper 20s regionwide. Abundant sunshine expected today with high pressure overhead, but it will stay cool with highs in the low 50s during the afternoon.{/p}{p}A similar story to start the work week on Monday with highs back in the mid-50s. Temperatures again trend upwards next week as it stays mainly dry. Wednesday looks warmest with the potential to reach record territory once again.{/p}{p}{strong}Check the latest weather stories for Southern New England on the {a href=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/weather-blog\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://turnto10.com/weather/weather-blog\"}Storm Team 10 Weather Blog.{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}Sunday: Mainly sunny. High: 52{/p}{p}Monday: Mainly cloudy. High: 55{/p}{p}Tuesday: Peeks of the sun. High: 69{/p}{p}Wednesday: Mix of sun and clouds. High: 75{/p}{p}Thursday: Mostly sunny. High: 66{/p}{p}Friday: Partly cloudy. High: 61{/p}{p}Saturday: Mostly sunny.
